analysis.key_quote: STOP GUTTING THE FEDERAL ADMINISTRATIVE INFRASTRUCTURE!!! PEOPLE ARE MORE IMPORTANT THAN MONEY, YOU THEIVING BASTARDS!!!!
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to changes that would undermine the federal administrative infrastructure, indicating a concern for the value of people over financial considerations. This aligns with themes of protecting merit-based systems and due process, as well as opposing politicization.
